Text:
In preparation for their showdown with Wethermon,
OiKatzo and Delta head out to find food, while
Pencilgon and Alpha embark on a recon mission in
the forest.
Sunraku and Cid find themselves left behind...
Um...sure hope everyone gets back soon.
Yeah...uh, agreed.

(Why am I stuck with house-sitting duty with some
guy I just met? Pencilgon should be the one doing
this since she's the social butterfly...)
So...nice weather we're having, huh?
Right, yeah...

(Of all people, I ended up alone with the most
eccentric character...)

(Okay, calm down. Now's the perfect time to act like
a side character. Starting with...)
Um, not sure if I should be bringing this up, but...
S-Sure! What's up?
...Why are you dressed like that?
Dressed like what...?

I mean, what's with the headgear, and also...why are
you shirtless?
Oh, right...

(W-Well, I guess that's the natural reaction... I've
become too comfortable in this getup, haven't I?)

(If Emul were here, she'd probably come up with some
sort of heroic tale... But that's just wishful thinking.)

(Having asked him...I can pretty much guess the
answer.)

(It's that classic setup where the eccentric-looking
character turns out to be totally OP! It's gotta be
that!)
Actually, it's because of a certain monster.
I see, a monster, huh...

(Hehe, I know, I know. It's the typical wild child
trope where he's been living in nature fighting
wild bears and boars, right?)

The thing that was placed on me back then...if I had
to describe it, I'd say it was a curse of sorts.
A curse?

Yeah. Technically it's a curse...but it's called
"Lycagon's Mark."
*gasp*
...Tell me more.
Um? S-Sure.

...So, after going one-on-one against this insanely
buffed monster called Lycagon the Nightslayer,
I ended up getting cursed...
..."Lycagon's Mark"...

(What the hell? That's so cool! The monster's name
is one thing, but calling a "curse" a "mark" is
seriously creative!)

(...Whoops, got a bit too excited there. But this
guy's got a cooler backstory than I imagined.)

(Yeah, I should hear him out more. There might be
some interesting lore to uncover!)

...So, does this "curse" have anything to do with
you being half-naked?

(Huh? He genuinely seems interested. Even his eyes
have gone all sparkly...)

(I don't really get it, but it's not like he has
anything to do with SLF...so I guess it's fine
to share a bit.)

I can't wear any gear on the parts of my body that
were cursed, hence the half-naked state.

The problems don't just end there. Weak enemies
run at the sight of me, so I constantly have to fight
opponents who are stronger than me...
Interesting...

(Hmm. You can tell a lot of effort went into his
backstory... He's definitely one of those named
characters who've got the cool factor!)

(In that case, I can let this bird guy shine and
prop him up from the shadows... Yup, yup,
that feels like the right shadowbroker move.)
(...Aha, I see. This Cid guy...)

(He's interested in my adventures in Shangri-La
Frontier! And he thinks it's all real...doesn't he?!)

(Heh... Well then, let me tell him about one of my
most epic adventures!)

Actually, I recently encountered something
incredible... Want to hear about it?

Well, you see...I found a way to visit this rabbit
country no one knows about!
...Rabbit country?

Yeah, that's right! From cute rabbits to crazy
buff ones, and they even made me super
strong weapons
R-Right... I see.

(He's totally losing interest! Hmm, did I choose the
wrong story?)
(Kinda sucks, but in that case...)

(His story suddenly took a turn into fairy tale
land... Wasn't he supposed to be the cool type?)

(No, there's gotta be more cool stories to come!
If that's the case)

U-Um...Cid, think you could tell me a bit more about
the kinda things you're into?

S-Sure... It'll be cool to get to know you better as
well, Sunraku.

Though their conversation is somewhat mismatched,
Cid and Sunraku manage to close the gap between
them a little...
